IT - Access & Permissions.definition: Technical restriction preventing login or module visibility
examples: User unable to login to Anaplan
Access denied while opening planning workspace

IT - Backend Mapping & Metadata.definition: Incorrect system-side configuration of hierarchies or entities
examples: Cost center not mapped in planning hierarchy

IT - Integration & Connectivity.definition: Failure of data movement between different software platforms
examples: Data not flowing from SAP to Anaplan

IT - Environment Versioning.definition: System-side version mismatch or visibility settings

IT - Data Entry Support.definition: Technical assistance required to facilitate bulk or manual uploads

User - Master Data Request.definition: Business request for the creation of new entities/products
examples: New cost center needs to be created
Add new entity to planning model

User - Business Logic Update.definition: Intentional change in how the business wants to calculate figures
examples: User requested change in planning logic

User - Calculation Discrepancy.definition: Dispute between system results and offline Excel calculations
examples: System and Excel showing different values

User - Capability & Training.definition: Lack of functional knowledge on how to navigate the system

User - Missing Submissions.definition: Business process delay where user has not provided required inputs

User - File Version Control.definition: Confusion caused by multiple or outdated offline files
